title: Windows 10 Tracking Disable Tool 2.5.1
description:
DisableWin - Windows Tracking Disable Tool 2.5.1 is a ligjhtweight, open-source app that aims to claw back your privacy. The app needs administrator privileges to apply the changes. It works smoothly on all Windows 10 versions and above all, it's free


Windows 10 Tracking Disable Tool is an very helpful option for privacy concerned users to disable the native tracking within Windows 10. 


Disable or delete the following:

- Services
- Clear DiagTrack Log
- Telemetry
- Block Tracking Domains
- Block even more Tracking Domains
- Block tracking IP adresses
- Uninstall OneDrive
- Stop Windows Defender/WifiSense Data Collection


NEW, now you can uninstalling the Windows 10 Built-In-Apps with one click.

- 3D Builder
- Calendar & Mail
- Camera
- Get Office App
- Get Skype App
- Get Started App
- Groove Music
- Maps
- Money
- Movies & TV
- News
- OneNote App
- People
- Microsoft Solitaire Collection
- Phone Companion
- Photos
- Sports
- Voice Recorder
- Weather
- XBox

Of course, it goes (almost) without saying: Use at your own risk!
